Available Skills & Tools

Cowork uses a modular skill system. Skills are collections of tools and domain-specific instructions that the Meta-Router loads dynamically based on your intent.

Core Skill Categories

CODING_TOOLS

Codebase Mastery

Read, write, and refactor code across entire repositories with context awareness.

workspace_write • workspace_read • grep_search
WEB_TOOLS

Web Intelligence

Scrape, crawl, and extract structured data from any website or online resource.

web_scrape • web_crawl • firecrawl
NEXTCLOUD_TOOLS

Cloud Syncing

Manage files and folders on your Nextcloud instance with full CRUD support.

nextcloud_upload • nextcloud_list
MULTIMODAL_TOOLS

Vision & Audio

Analyze images, generate assets, and perform speech-to-text / text-to-speech.

vision_analyze • image_generate
